## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand with a buffer for demand variability, while utilizing available vendor order quantities and achieving the discount threshold. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 5,000 units higher than player's planned order. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 4.6 days                               |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 6 days                                  |
| Comments                          | Ordering 30,000 units, allows achieving the 11% discount threshold. Additionally, it provides a buffer against potential demand fluctuations and ensures sufficient stock for the next 6 days, covering the forecasted demand and the lead time. This strategy balances potential stockouts with cost savings from the discount. |
